content: After the first 80 days of the new administration I can say honestly that I have no idea what they're thinking and no idea what the plan going forward is. Trump might call this unpredictability an attempt not to telegraph- he may even say it's his inherent flexibility. I'd call it dangerous.Politics are best when they are infinitely boring. Not having a firm game plan, winging it so to speak, based on visceral reactions to moments of crisis will not end well.
